In the chaotic world of Toilet Tower Defense on Roblox, few units stand out quite like the Camera Troops. These versatile and powerful defenders bring both style and substance to the battlefield, combining high damage output with flexible range and utility. Whether you‚Äôre holding the front line or sniping from a distance, Camera Troops adapt to nearly any situation with ease. Their unique abilities make them a must-have for players aiming to push through tougher waves and dominate the toilet invasion. Follow along with our TTD Camera Troops tier list and guide to see which ones are the best.

Toilet Tower Defense Camera Troops Tier List

As we can see here, not all Toilet Tower Defense Camera Troops were created equal. Some are unbelievably good, and some are borderline unusable. The Quantum Cameraman, for example, can solo most maps without even being maxed out, while some other Mythics and Exclusives struggle even with help. We will go into detail about these rankings below.

OBTAINABLE Toilet Tower Defense Camera Trops List

Here are all the Obtainable TTD Camera Troops, ranked by rarity and usefulness. I will also include a detailed explanation of what each damage type is below:

  • Single: A troop that attacks a single unit at a time.
  • Multi-target: A troop that attacks multiple enemies at once.
  • AOE: A troop that attacks in a large area and doesn‚Äôt target individual units.
  • Slowing: A troop that slows down the enemies that it hits.
  • Stun: A troop that stuns enemies.
  • Splash: A troop that attacks a single unit, but also damages their adjacent enemies.
  • Burst: A troop that fires multiple attacks at once.
  • Teleport: A troop that teleports enemies to the start of the map.
  • Pushing: A troop that pushes enemies back when attacking.
  • Moveable: A troop that you can control to move around and attack enemies.
  • Spawner: A troop that summons minions from your base to fight enemies.
  • Retaliate: A troop that does not attack, but blocks enemy attacks. (Horrible)
  • Healer: A troop that heals its allies every few seconds.
  • Unstun: A troop that removes a stun from an ally every few seconds.
  • Piercing: A troop that has attacks that pierce multiple enemies.
  • Farm: A troop that generates money passively and does not attack.
  • Booster: A troop that boosts the DPS of other troops around it.
  • Forcefield: A troop that generates a powerful Forcefield to stop enemies.

We recommend the Large Cameraman and Orbital Camera for beginners who want to go through the levels fast and make some money. For later on, the Sniper Cameraman and the Upgraded Mech Cameraman can carry you through the harder parts of the game.
